metadata.feature_description: Manages version control settings for both pages and files, allowing administrators to enable/disable versioning and set maximum version limits

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable page versioning and verify it saves correctly

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Settings > Site Settings > Site Behavior > More
steps.expected: Versioning section is visible with Page Versioning toggle
steps.actual: Versioning section displayed with Enable Page Versioning toggle set to On

steps.action: Toggle Page Versioning On and click Save
steps.expected: Settings should save with success message
steps.actual: Settings saved successfully with 'Settings have been updated' message

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable page versioning and verify it saves correctly

steps.action: Click on Enable Page Versioning toggle to disable it
steps.expected: Toggle should change to Off state

steps.actual: Settings saved with success message, Save button disabled after save

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set maximum page versions within valid range (1-20)

steps.action: Change Maximum Number of Page Versions Kept to 15
steps.expected: Value should be accepted without validation error
steps.actual: Value 15 entered successfully, no validation error displayed

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Attempt to set page versions outside valid range and verify validation error

steps.action: Enter 25 in Maximum Number of Page Versions Kept field (above max of 20)
steps.actual: Red validation error icon appeared next to the field

steps.action: Enter 0 in Maximum Number of Page Versions Kept field (below min of 1)
steps.actual: Red validation error icon appeared next to the field

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Enable file versioning and verify it saves correctly

steps.action: Verify Enable File Versioning toggle is On
steps.expected: File Versioning toggle should be visible and set to On
steps.actual: File Versioning toggle visible and set to On

steps.action: Re-enable file versioning after disabling and save
steps.actual: File versioning enabled and saved successfully

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Disable file versioning and verify it saves correctly

steps.action: Click on Enable File Versioning toggle to disable it
steps.expected: Toggle should change to Off state

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set maximum file versions within valid range (5-25)

steps.action: Change Maximum Number of File Versions Kept to 15
steps.expected: Value should be accepted without validation error
steps.actual: Value 15 entered successfully, no validation error displayed

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Attempt to set file versions outside valid range and verify validation error

steps.action: Enter 30 in Maximum Number of File Versions Kept field (above max of 25)
steps.actual: Red validation error icon appeared next to the field

steps.action: Enter 3 in Maximum Number of File Versions Kept field (below min of 5)
steps.actual: Red validation error icon appeared next to the field

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify changes persist after page refresh

steps.action: Save settings with Page Versioning On (10), File Versioning On (5)
Refresh the page and navigate back to Versioning settings
steps.actual: All settings persisted correctly: Page Versioning On (10), File Versioning On (5)

observations: The versioning settings are located under Admin > Settings > Site Settings > Site Behavior > More tab
Page versioning valid range appears to be 1-20 based on validation behavior
File versioning valid range appears to be 5-25 based on validation behavior
Validation errors are displayed with a red exclamation icon next to the invalid field
The Save button becomes disabled after successful save, indicating the form state is clean
Settings persist correctly after page refresh
